short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to watch stocks price while browsing the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a little rocket widget that shows the change in the price of Gamestop stock. 
Updates are planned for the future, including, an option to watch the stock of your choice.
